description: More than 200 Britons flee Verbier, defying a Swiss order to remain in their hotels and chalets.
title: Covid: British skiers flee Verbier amid Swiss quarantine
title_page: Covid: British skiers flee Verbier amid Swiss quarantine - BBC News
maintext: Ski resorts were crowded in neighbouring Austria at the weekend, but Austria's quarantine means that very few foreign tourists have travelled there. For locals too the options are limited, as hotels and restaurants are shut, and social distancing has reduced the cable car and train services.
